text: Vitali Yudin (; born 17 June 1974) is a former Russian football player. Yudin played in the 1992 Russian Top League with FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Vitali Yudin
